reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of EECE 331, ELEC 371 and one of EECE 360, ELEC 341 and one of EECE 364, ELEC 311 and one of EECE 269, ELEC 221, EECE 359.
Equivalents: BMEG 390.
description: Physical principles of ultrasound, magnetic resonance, computed tomography, X-ray projection imaging and molecular imaging in medical imaging for diagnostics, therapeutics, and interventions.
